interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NATWAG Reusable Update Makeup Remover Cloths for Sensitive Skin - Microfiber Face Cloth Makeup Remover | Washable Round Makeup Remover Pads | Natural Facial Towels (2 Pads,2 Cloth) (Purple)
Review Date: 2020/07/20
Store: Natwag
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '12.75 x 9.88 x 0.59 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569978'}
Review Text: I've read about these and wanted to give them a try; you wet them with warm water (or micellar water) then wipe with off your makeup with them. They really do work, and feel so nice since they're very soft! Sometimes I press them gently against my eyes for a moment or two to help remove the more stubborn makeup, or gently rub. You wash once they're full of makeup, putting them in a garment bag, and I try to put them in a wash with no fabric softener.
Review Title: works great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'} I'm pretty happy about the LumaRx facial cleansing brush. It is designed very ergonomically and is very comfortable to hold during use. The tool is extremely lightweight and has a tapered design which makes it so comfortable to use. The instructions are to use it for a minute each morning and evening. It has illustrations which show you to spend 20 seconds on the right side and 20 seconds on the left side and 20 seconds on the T-zone. The tool will actually buzz gently when you should move to the next area. This is a great feature! It also comes with 3 brush heads; massage, sensitive and normal skin. I am using the sensitive for now and it is perfect for a gentle exfoliation. When I am finished with that minute, my skin just glows and feels so clean! Hopefully the heads do not need replaced quickly as I do not think they are yet available on Amazon or online. It also comes with a sleek charger that does not take up any room at all on the counter – this is important to me as I have a small bathroom. Also, the LumaRx comes with a very nice carrying case that will come in handy for an upcoming vacation. Exciting product for smooth and glowing skin It’S SKIN Signature D’escargot Unwrinkle Snail Cream 55ml 1.86 fl. oz. - Anti Aging Wrinkle Care Skin Tightening Repair Moisturizing Essence for Youthful Appearance Mucin Serum Gel It’s Skin {'Brand': 'It’s Skin', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.8598 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Mature', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} I've heard of face cream made from snails (or their secretions) and was a bit hesitant to give it a try. This is from Korea so perhaps that's not so surprising, and has a nice citrus scent to it, is a nice thick cream (no SPF) that does a really good job moisturizing my skin. It absorbs quickly and gives it a nice, dewy look and does seem to provide some tightness to it. yes, snail cream The Sunset Dusk Palette | 15 Color Eye Shadow of BEAUTY GLAZED Eyeshadow Palette | QyeeCosmetics. - Amazon Vine Qyee Cosmetics {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.1 x 0.6 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '725714076539'} Okay, I love eyeshadow palettes and probably have too many, and they range in price and brand. I definitely love the 'sunset/rose gold' palettes, and this reminds me of a Huda palette I have with similar shades. It's in a slim, cardboard palette without a mirror, but this is a lower price point for all the shades you get. The shadow itself is a creamy powder blend, and it suggests that you use your fingers for the metallic shades (I find a small crease blush works fine and tends to have less loose powder that way).

You have a nice mix of matte and metallic shades this way, with a lot of earth tones. Definitely a lot of copper and reds here, some golds and rose golds and pinks. Colors that will stand out but not all of them. These felt nice on the skin and blended well. Why the three stars?

I tried this with and without primer, and this kit definitely needs primer to last more than a couple of hours on my skin. Also? The mattes will last several hours, but not the metallics even with primer (as well as a setting spray on top). I love the metallic colors, but they just fade on me somehow - even if I layer them on top of the matte. I'm used to eyeshadow blending on me after a few hours, but never have I seen metallics melt away on me like this. That's not to mean it won't work better on other people.

Still, for the price it's a nice range of colors and a fun palette to play with, so it's worth a try. pretty colors, some staying power Snowflakes Beauty Sponge Makeup Blender-Latex Free， Tear Drop Shape Sponge Flawless Coverage of Powder, Cream, Liquid. (Pink) Snowflakes {'Brand': 'Snowflakes', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.3 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '738598331618'} This is a great makeup sponge and works just as well as others that cost a lot more. You can use it damp or dry (I moisten it when I'm applying liquid foundation, but can use it dry when cleaning up eye shadow or applying some blush). It's nice and soft so it feels good against the skin, and applies the makeup in an even fashion. great at blending makeup NATWAG Reusable Update Makeup Remover Cloths for Sensitive Skin - Microfiber Face Cloth Makeup Remover | Washable Round Makeup Remover Pads | Natural Facial Towels (2 Pads,2 Cloth) (Purple) Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive,All Skin Types', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '12.75 x 9.88 x 0.59 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569978'} I've read about these and wanted to give them a try; you wet them with warm water (or micellar water) then wipe with off your makeup with them. They really do work, and feel so nice since they're very soft! Sometimes I press them gently against my eyes for a moment or two to help remove the more stubborn makeup, or gently rub. You wash once they're full of makeup, putting them in a garment bag, and I try to put them in a wash with no fabric softener. works great
profile:
### Updated User Profile Summary

**General Preferences:**
- Values ergonomics and comfort in product design.
- Prioritizes lightweight and space-saving features, especially in small living spaces.
- Appreciates products with clear, user-friendly instructions and intuitive functionality.

**Product Focus:**
- Interest in facial cleansing tools, moisturizing products with anti-aging benefits, and exploring diverse color cosmetics, particularly eyeshadow palettes.
- Recently expanded focus to include high-performance makeup application tools, especially versatile blenders and reusable makeup remover cloths suitable for sensitive skin.
- Emphasizes gentle exfoliation and seeks multifunctional products for sensitive skin.

**Desired Outcomes:**
- Goals include achieving smooth, glowing skin, maintaining cleanliness, enhancing makeup application, and ensuring even makeup finishes.
- Values features that promote routine adherence, focusing on product longevity and performance, particularly in makeup tools and skincare.

**Shopping Considerations:**
- Values product sustainability, reusability, and the availability of replacement parts.
- Interested in accessories that enhance product usability and support effective makeup application.
- Open to innovative formulations in skincare and cosmetics with beneficial properties.

**Future Intents:**
- Likely to consider travel-friendly beauty tools and cosmetics while maintaining an emphasis on lightweight and ergonomic design.
- Shows a willingness to experiment with unique formulations that prioritize both skin health and convenience, influenced by recent positive experiences with effective cleansing solutions.
